title: Championship Jewel Error? - Peculiar jewel cap/jewels going missing.
body:
I'm hoping someone has an answer to this problem, and many of the folk who travel here are wise.

This concerns Hextech Crafting with the new Championship Jewels, obtained from daily bundles for 150 IP, or from Championship Chests as extras.

The problem is perplexing: when one of these 150 IP packages are opened, there should be two jewels given, and your total should go up, like from 9, to 11. In my case, I seem to be capped at 9 gems, as I've opened up two 150Ip packages now to add to my gem total, and it's remained at 9. I've waited several hours, and relogged a few times in that period, but my gems have never appeared. 

Is it normal to be capped at nine like this, when it takes ten gems to upgrade an icon? Should I be opening the 150 IP bundles at a certain time, so that the gems actually are credited to my account? I'm sad that I'm losing IP, and unable to upgrade icons, to whatever is happening, but I'm willing to try suggestions to fix it.

Thank you for your help.

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any cap, and ad it's concerning to hear that your inventory wasn't adjusting so I looked into this for you.  I counted your jewels individually, and it looks to me like 9 jewels are correct.  To break it down:  You received 9 jewels for 3 chests that you opened up on September 28.  You then bought a Game day chest for 2 jewels making your total 11.  You spent 10 jewels on the Worlds Championship tier 2 icon.  This brought your total back to 1 jewel.

Since then you obtained 2 jewels per game day for Sept 30th, Oct 1, Oct 2, and today.  That brought your total to 9.  Remember that you can only buy the IP jewels once per [game day.  ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)

I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary, but I hope that helps clear things up!

You are amazing. Thank you so much. I must be insane, and I'm sorry for taking the valuable time of your day. I feel so much better though. Thank you for giving me peace of mind, and I'll be more careful in the future before asking questions. You just turned my mood right around. *bowed* You're the best. <3
I have the exact same problem.
